App description:
Coloring books are a timeless, easy way for adults and kids to have fun making art. But what if you could step into the coloring book? In Color Space you dont just color in a scene  you color inside a scene.
Equipped with a palette and a coloring wand, youre transported into any of 16 beautiful black-and-white worlds. You fill in the world with as many colors as you like, one tree, rock and flower at a time.
As you color, the scene comes to life around you. Rivers run, birds fly, planets revolve, meteors shine. The soundscape responds hypnotically as you color.
